I Specialize In

Web development and design. My focus is bringing you up to date websites that are easy to navigate and aesthetically pleasing.

The Process

The process that I use to create my websites are designed with your vision in mind to get the best outcome.

(Hover the icons below for more details)

(Click the icons below for more details)

1

We'll begin with a discussion of your goals and aspirations for the website, and come up with a rough sketch of your ideal layout.

(Click outsite of the box to close)

Discuss The Project

2

Once we know what your site should look like, I can begin to plan the specifics for interactive elements and what technology we'll use to accomplish our goals.

(Click outsite of the box to close)

Development & Design Planning

3

After that, I'll spend some time building the site and communicating the progress with you. Once both parties are happy, we can move to the last step.

(Click outsite of the box to close)

Creating The Page

4

When the website is complete and you're happy with the results, I deliver the site to you (including any source files requested).
